affordability-graphic:
Figure 3. Foundations of Internet Affordability

Affordability
Healthy Competition
Infrastructure Sharing
Non-discriminatory Access to Spectrum
Universal Access to Rural & Underserved Populations
Effective Broadband Strategies
Leadership
indicator-table:
{{table}} 2014 Affordability Index Structure
CodeName
Access
A5Clear, time-bound targets in Nat’l Broadband Plan for reducing cost & increasing penetration
A12USFs used to subsidise access for underserved & underprivileged populations
A4ICT regulatory decisions informed by adequate evidence
A13Specific policies to promote free or low-cost access
A11To what extent have Universal Access/Service Funds (USF) prioritised infrastructure investments that will reduce costs and increase access for underserved communities and market segments?
A2To what extent does the gov’t ICT regulator perform its functions according to published and transparent rules, with the ICT regulatory decisions influenced by public consultations?
WIMarket Concentration - Herfindahl Index (HHI)
ITU_KExistence of National Broadband Plan
ITU_BBroadband subscribers (per 100 people)
WI_BMobile subscribers (per 100 people)
WI_CMobile broadband connections (per 100 people)
WEF_BInternet access in schools
ITU_EYECluster of ITU indicators (bundled)
ITU_NPercentage of individuals using the Internet
Infrastructure
A1Flexible, technology & service neutral ICT licensing frameworks
A8Specific guidelines for public infrastructure funding & telecoms subsidies
A9Time bound gov’t plan to make available broadband spectrum for high-speed data services
A10Transparent, competitive and fair process for increasing spectrum availability
A3To what extent does the regulator and/or the competition commission enforce the country's ICT licensing requirements and regulations?
A6National policies in place facilitating efficient access to public rights of way & tower zoning permissions
A7To what extent does the government facilitate resource sharing across telecommunications operators?
ITU_GPercentage of population covered by mobile cellular network
ITU_AInternational bandwidth per Internet user (Mbps)
ITU_OBroadband speed (Average Mbps)
ITU_LInvestment per telecom subscriber (average over 3 years)
WB_ASecure Internet servers (per 1 million people)
IEAAElectrification Rate
PCHExistence of Internet Exchange Points (IXPs)
